snippet: Carbon fiber in cars has mostly been confined to high-price exotics like  Ferraris and Lamborghinis, but the high-strength, low-weight material is beginning to show up in less-expensive cars.
abstract: Carbon fiber in cars has mostly been confined to high-price exotics like Ferraris and Lamborghinis, but high-strength, low-weight material is beginning to show up in less-expensive cars.
lead_paragraph: Carbon fiber in cars has mostly been confined to high-price exotics like  Ferraris and Lamborghinis, but the high-strength, low-weight material is beginning to show up in less-expensive cars.

headline.main: Carbon Fiber, Light and Strong, Arrives Where It’s Most Needed
headline.print_headline: Carbon Fiber, Light and Strong, Arrives Where It’s Most Needed
